prompt: Why won't my printer print?
My documents just disappear into the print queue.
What's this 'paper jam' message?
Can I print from my microwave?
How do I refill my ink? With a spoon?
Why does the Wi-Fi keep dropping?
I unplugged the router to clean it. Now nothing works.
I connected my toaster to the guest network. Is that okay?
Why is the firewall blocking my favorite torrent site?
VPN won't connect. Is that normal?
Where's the 'send' button in Outlook?
I accidentally replied all to the entire company. Fix it.
Outlook says I'm out of storage. Can you delete someone's mail instead?
Why does spam keep showing up in my inbox?
Can I CC my cat on emails?
I forgot my password again.
Why can't my password just be 'password'?
I wrote my password on a sticky note. It's gone.
How do I recover my password from memory loss?
My hamster chewed up my 2FA code.
The system asked for an update. I clicked 'later'. Now it's broken.
Do I *have* to install updates?
I updated to Windows 95. Is that bad?
The update restarted my computer mid-email!
Can I install updates over dial-up?
Can I install Chrome from this USB I found?
My screen is upside-down. I blame PowerPoint.
Why doesn't Excel understand art?
I installed something from a banner ad. Now everything’s slow.
What's this thing called Task Manager?
The coffee tray won't eject anymore.
My mouse won’t move. But I can shake it.
I dropped my laptop. Can you fix the floor?
Is the cup holder part of the CPU?
My monitor smells funny after I microwaved soup near it.
Is it bad if my browser toolbar says 'H@xx0rZ'?
The antivirus blocked me. Am I the virus?
I shared my login with a friend. Is that okay?
Can you unblock the site that says 'Install now, free Bitcoin'?
How do I disable all security warnings?
Can I run Crysis on the office firewall?
What’s the Wi-Fi password for the afterlife?
Can you teach Excel to love?
Why don’t our computers have floppy drives?
What’s the USB plug for? Coffee warmer?
